description: Unique identifier for the charge category used to classify additional fees in maintenance or parts transactions and to link records across tables.
Human-readable label for the charge category displayed on work orders, invoices, and reports to classify additional fees.
Flag indicating the charge category is inactive and should not be used on new transactions, retained only for historical reference and reporting.
Flag indicating the charge category represents a refundable core deposit for parts, driving separate accounting and potential credit when cores are returned.
